abstracts.cdata!:
This Request for Inspection was filed by
            The Federation of Persons Affected by Yacyreta in Itapua and
            Misiones (Federaci�n de Afectados por Yacyreta de Itapua y
            Misiones - FEDAYIM), to examine the effects flooding has had
            on numerous families that were relocated on the banks of the
            Potiy River in Paraguay. The Request cites that the building
            of the dam on the Parana River also caused the healthy
            drinking water to be polluted and that the building of
            housing settlements along the river also caused more
            pollution of drinking water. A waste management plant that
            was planned will not benefit the neighborhoods along the
            river and the group believes that pollution will be
            irreparable. The stagnant water in the reservoir behind the
            dam also causes concern because of microorganisms and the
            harboring of diseases.  The response submits that the area
            flooded had been a floodplain and was usually flooded before
            the implementation of the dam.  As a result of a large
            passage of time between the raising of the reservoir water
            and the resettlement of communities, new groups of people
            entered the area and settled in areas that were to be
            resettled.  The Management believes that the obligations
            concerning the project have been carried out and an
            Inspection Panel investigation is not warranted.
